title: I had a really bad and scary nightmare, it’s really freaking me out and I can’t stop shaking or crying, how can I calm down? - Quora

response.answer_text: Embrace it. Realize that your nightmares are nothing external; they exist entirely within your own mind. The monsters you see in a dream are yours. That means that, even if they play on your fears, they are your monsters. They can't harm you. They are you. And that means you're stronger. You're no longer just a person. You're a person with monsters.
That has happened to me. I had to go check all the children and touch them. Drink some juice and turn on some calming music. It was 3 hours before I closed my eyes again.
